title: Acupuncture for Physical, Emotional, and Spiritual Health in San Francisco — Quantum Integral Healing Arts
description: Experience holistic healing with acupuncture at Quantum Integral Healing Arts in San Francisco. Our Board-Certified Medical Acupuncturist, Dr. Edsall, specializes in restoring energetic flow for patients suffering from trauma, chronic pain, and other complex illnesses. Schedule an appointment today.
cleaned_text: Acupuncture Acupuncture supports our emotional, physical, and spiritual health by attending to blockages and energetic stagnation in the body which may manifest as pain, low energy, depression, anxiety, or other physical or psychological symptoms. Acupuncture is particularly helpful when working with patients who have suffered trauma, either physically or emotionally. Chronic pain and/or other complex medical and psychological illnesses can be a result of old wounds the body has harbored over time. Acupuncture is a wonderful way to restore energetic flow to help heal these old wounds and restore integral health and wellness. Dr. Edsall is a Board Certified Medical Acupuncturist and has been incorporating acupuncture in her practice since 2014. She has used acupuncture as an adjunctive treatment for patients on inpatient medical wards, in outpatient active-duty military clinics, at Stanford's Integrative Medical Clinic, at Dignity Health's outpatient clinics and most recently at Quantum Integral Healing Arts. Realize your true potential Get in touch to learn more BALANCE: We support our clients and fellow clinicians to create healthy and balanced lives in attendance of the Body, Mind, and Spirit
